# showLightExtents

**Type Property**

Display the regions affected by each [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight] object in the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
static var showLightExtents: SCNDebugOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

Only lights whose type is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/LightType/omni] or [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/LightType/spot] have an area of effect; directional and ambient lights affect the entire scene.

## Debugging Cameras and Lighting

- **showCameras**: Display visualizations for nodes in the scene with attached cameras and their fields of view.
- **showLightInfluences**: Display the locations of each [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight] object in the scene.
